name: villadaspedras-lib
description: Biblioteca com funções auxiliares para planilhas do Google Apps Script
author: Leonardo Puglia

scripts.build: rimraf build/** dist/** && pnpm run format:source && node scripts/build-rollup.js
scripts.push:dev:force: node scripts/build-deploy.js config.yml dev push null --force
scripts.push:prod:force: node scripts/build-deploy.js config.yml prod push null --force
scripts.debug:project: node scripts/build-deploy.js config.yml dev push && npx clasp logs
scripts.debug:project:prod: node scripts/build-deploy.js config.yml prod push && npx clasp logs
scripts.debug:project:dev: node scripts/build-deploy.js config.yml dev push && npx clasp logs
scripts.push:project:key: node scripts/build-deploy.js config.yml dev push PROJECT KEY
scripts.execute:project:key: node scripts/build-deploy.js config.yml dev execute PROJECT KEY
scripts.debug:project:key: node scripts/build-deploy.js config.yml dev push PROJECT KEY && npx clasp logs
scripts.push:project:key:prod: node scripts/build-deploy.js config.yml prod push PROJECT KEY
scripts.execute:project:key:prod: node scripts/build-deploy.js config.yml prod execute PROJECT KEY
scripts.debug:project:key:prod: node scripts/build-deploy.js config.yml prod push PROJECT KEY && npx clasp logs
